section: Client acknowledges and agrees that all due dates set forth in the Scope of Work are guaranteed by the Company, regardless of whether the company receives required materials, documentation, or approvals in a timely fashion from the client. Delays will not affect the due dates.
explanation: This section states that the due dates are guaranteed by the Company regardless of whether the company receives required materials from the client on time. This is an inconsistency because it is not possible for the company to deliver its project in time if the client does not give them the materials on time. This clause is contradictory because it holds the company responsible for delays caused by the client.

section: However, the Client can pay the remaining amount at any time, or in multiple installments, before the Scope of Work completion.
explanation: This clause contradicts the earlier clause in Section 2, which says that the Client shall pay the remaining $3,100 on completion of the Scope of Work. This clause suggests that the Client can pay at any time, so that makes the due date ambigious.

section: Company is obligated to continue providing Customer Service throughout the duration of this agreement, and may not alter or cease providing Customer Service. Company at its sole discretion may at any time alter or cease providing the Customer Service which it has agreed to provide to Client relating to Client Website pursuant to this Agreement without any liability to Company.
explanation: This section contains contradicting terms. It first mentions that 'Company is obligated to continue providing Customer Service throughout the duration of this agreement, and may not alter or cease providing Customer Service'. This contradicts the next sentance where it mentions that 'Company at its sole discretion may at any time alter or cease providing the Customer Service'. Both clauses contradict each other. One clause mentions that it cannot alter the Customer Service while the next clause mentions that it can alter it at any time.
